::Battera::

She went to her quarters and closed the door behind her.  She sat in 
her chair and folded her wings around her body.  SHe felt cold.  Not 
that the room was cold, but an inner cold spreading over her. She 
started wondering why she was even here. Why was she even trying.  
She knew her time on the ship would have to be cut short with that 
Wwolverine in the ship, it was no longer safe for her.  She wanted to 
try to talk to him and make peace with ihm, but he would only try to 
kill her.  She didn't feel comfortable with any bot hating her.  She 
thought about it and slumped into her chair.
